title: Van-Life
desc: A responsive simple vans rental website, that includes user interface to check available vans for rental & host dashboard to control their hosted vans.

title: House Wallet
tech: HTML, CSS, JS, BS5, PHP, MySQL
desc: A house budgeting web app to manage their household budgets effectively by tracking expenses, setting budgets, & monitoring spending habits.

title: Chic Chick
desc: A simple simulation for an online women wear store. The website includes products categorizing & a simple shopping cart -no payment proceeding-.

title: Bitnine Clone
desc: A webpage that replicates the main features and design of the original Btinine website's home. It was part of bitnine's 2023 internship filtration test.

title: Markdown Previewer
desc: A simple Markdown previewer app. On typing any md code in the textarea, it's immediately displayed in the preview box, that's been parsed using marked.js library.

title: Background Generator
desc: A web app that generates the css rule for backgrounds whether it was a plain color or a gradient. User can preview generated colors and their css rules & copy it.

title: Temperature Converter
desc: A realtime temperature Converter with 3 included measuring units: Celsius, Fahrenheit and Kelvin, and invalid input detection.

title: Tenzies
desc: A dynamic interactive webgame. Responsive on all devices. High score tracking is included.

title: Drum Machine
desc: A simple drum machine that works using mouse clicks and keyboard keys (Q, W, E, A, S, D, Z, X, and C), and responsive on all devices.

title: React Calculator
desc: A simple basic calculator that supports formula based calculations and responsive on all devices.

title: Quotes Generator
desc: A Random Quotes Generator app that displays a random quote each time the 'New Quote' button is clicked and supports sharing the displayed quote on Twitter.
